track.name: Thugz Mansion
comments: G-Funk H-Town Style!!!!! featuring all the South Side hard hitters
ain't no place I'd rather be!
I shied from 2Pac for years (and I mean YEARS) because I figured his music just wouldn't mesh with my tastes. This song convinced me that genius transcends genre every time.
man I remember being in 6th grade hearing this on the radio and then just bumpin' the album later on with my portable cd player... RIP Pac
this song is great no pausing parring differently
definitely the best track from Better Dayz album
Both versions are superb, but this one has a better vibe to it IMO (vs. the Nas Acoustic).
watch my daddy scream peace while the other man shot him
the version with nas on is from the nas album god's son i think it's tagged 'thugz mansion (N.Y)' it's nas feat. 2pac and j. pheonix,
Is the acoustic one tagged any differently? I know Nas does a verse...
i used to listen to this song A LOT. i like the acoustic version the most.
